text: Indumati Bhattacharya (born 2 July 1918) is an Indian politician. She was elected to the Lok Sabha, lower house of the Parliament of India from Hooghly, West Bengal in 1984 as a member of the Indian National Congress. Bhattacharya was born in Hooghly district, Bengal Presidency, British India. She married Umanath Bhattacharyya. They have one son. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Politicians from West Bengal Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Indumati Bhattacharya
